languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Авгур-операторы{/g} сообщают о множественных вспышках бунтов и прочих проявлений сил {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} в разных точках планеты. Согласно обрывкам сообщений, что выловили наши {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-операторы{/g}, сопротивление губернаторских войск практически отсутствует. Миллионы людей массово обращаются в богохульный культ Последнего восхода и собираются в молитвенные круги".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Авгур-операторы{/g} сообщают о множественных вспышках бунтов и прочих проявлений сил {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} в разных точках планеты. Согласно обрывкам сообщений, что выловили наши {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-операторы{/g}, сопротивление губернаторских войск практически отсутствует. Миллионы людей массово обращаются в богохульный культ Последнего восхода и собираются в молитвенные круги".

languages.text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Авгур-операторы{/g} сообщают о множественных вспышках бунтов и прочих проявлений сил {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} в разных точках планеты. Миллионы людей массово обращаются в богохульный культ Последнего восхода и собираются в молитвенные круги".

Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

languages.text: “我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}操作员报告称，这颗行星的许多区域都发生了叛乱，还检测到了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的力量迹象。根据我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}操作员收集而来的通讯片段，总督的部队几乎没有进行任何抵抗。几百万人正在集体皈依‘终末黎明’邪教，聚在一起进行大规模祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

traits.locale_text: “我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇矩阵{/g}操作员报告称，这颗行星的许多区域都发生了叛乱，还检测到了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的力量迹象。根据我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}操作员收集而来的通讯片段，总督的部队几乎没有进行任何抵抗。几百万人正在集体皈依‘终末黎明’邪教，聚在一起进行大规模祈祷。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}オペレーターによると、この惑星の様々な場所で、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の力による反乱やその他の現象が多数報告されています。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}オペレーターが拾った通信の断片によると、総督軍による抵抗は事実上皆無のようです。何百万人もの人々が、冒涜的な最後の夜明け魔女団に集団改宗し、祈りの輪に集まっているようです」
languages.original_text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}オペレーターによると、この惑星の様々な場所で、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の力による反乱やその他の現象が多数報告されています。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}オペレーターが拾った通信の断片によると、総督軍による抵抗は事実上皆無のようです。何百万人もの人々が、冒涜的な最後の黄昏教団に集団改宗し、祈りの輪に集まっているようです」

「{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}スキャナー{/g}オペレーターによると、この惑星の様々な場所で、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の力による反乱やその他の現象が多数報告されています。{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}オペレーターが拾った通信の断片によると、総督軍による抵抗は事実上皆無のようです。何百万人もの人々が、冒涜的な最後の夜明け魔女団に集団改宗し、祈りの輪に集まっているようです」

languages.text: "Unsere {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} melden mehrere Aufstände und andere Manifestationen der Kräfte des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} an verschiedenen Orten auf dem Planeten. Den Kommunikationsfragmenten nach, die unser {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Personal empfangen hat, leisten die Kräfte des Gouverneurs praktisch keinen Widerstand. Millionen konvertieren in Massen zu dem blasphemischen Kult der letzten Dämmerung und versammeln sich zu Gebetskreisen."
languages.original_text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} melden mehrere Aufstände und andere Manifestationen der Kräfte des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} an verschiedenen Orten auf dem Planeten. Den Kommunikationsfragmenten nach, die unser {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Personal empfangen hat, leisten die Kräfte des Gouverneurs praktisch keinen Widerstand. Millionen konvertieren in Massen zu dem blasphemischen Kult der letzten Dämmerung und versammeln sich zu Gebetskreisen."

languages.text: « Nos opérateurs d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augure{/g} signalent de nombreux soulèvements et autres manifestations des pouvoirs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} un peu partout sur la planète. À en croire les bribes de communication captées par nos {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}opérateurs-vox{/g}, les forces du gouverneur n'opposent pratiquement pas de résistance. Des gens se convertissent par millions au culte blasphématoire de l'Aube finale et se rassemblent dans des cercles de prières. »
languages.original_text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

traits.locale_text: « Nos opérateurs d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augure{/g} signalent de nombreux soulèvements et autres manifestations des pouvoirs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} un peu partout sur la planète. À en croire les bribes de communication captées par nos {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}opérateurs-vox{/g}, les forces du gouverneur n'opposent pratiquement pas de résistance. Des gens se convertissent par millions au culte blasphématoire de l'Aube finale et se rassemblent dans des cercles de prières. »

languages.text: «Nuestros operadores {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} informan de un gran número de levantamientos y otras manifestaciones de los poderes del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} en distintas regiones del planeta. Según los fragmentos de comunicación que recibieron los operadores de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocos{/g}, las fuerzas del gobernador apenas oponen resistencia. Millones de personas se convierten en masa al blasfemo Culto del Amanecer Final y se reúnen en círculos de oración».
languages.original_text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

Millones de personas se convierten en masa al blasfemo Culto del Amanecer Final y se reúnen en círculos de oración».

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Alamet{/g} operatörlerimiz, gezegenin çeşitli yerlerinde çok sayıda ayaklanma ve {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} güçlerinin benzer tezahürlerini bildiriyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} operatörlerimiz tarafından toplanan bölük pörçük istihbarata göre, valinin kuvvetleri neredeyse hiçbir direnç göstermiyor. Milyonlarca insan, kitleler hâlinde kâfir Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'na katılıyor ve dua çemberleri oluşturuyor."
languages.original_text: "Our {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augur{/g} operators are reporting numerous uprisings and other manifestations of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s powers at various locations on the planet. Based on the fragments of communications picked up by our {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} operators, there is practically no resistance being offered by the governor's forces. Millions of people are converting to the blasphemous Final Dawn cult en masse and assembling in prayer circles."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Alamet{/g} operatörlerimiz, gezegenin çeşitli yerlerinde çok sayıda ayaklanma ve {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın başka güçlerinin tecelli ettiğini bildiriyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks{/g} operatörlerimiz tarafından toplanan parçalı iletilere dayanarak söyleyeyim, valinin kuvvetleri neredeyse hiçbir direnç göstermiyor. Milyonlarca insan, toplu hâlde kâfir Nihai Şafak tarikatına katılıyor ve dua çemberleri oluşturuyor."
